text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section and § 13-805 of this subtitle, the fee for each certificate of title issued under this title is $100.

section.section: For fiscal years 2012 through 2014 only, the fee for each certificate of title issued for a rental vehicle is $50.
The fee for each certificate of title issued for a motor scooter or a moped is $20.
